name: WhatTapped
0:
”Alexa, ask What Tapped Where is Pallet Jack in Portland?”
”Alexa, ask What Tapped Where are My Beers in Seattle?”
”Alexa, ask What Tapped What is new at Chucks CD?”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: what tapped
Developer Terms of Use
des:
WhatTapped helps you find the beer that you want to drink. WhatTapped scours beer lists automatically on your behalf and tells you where to find your favorite beers. 

WhatTapped is currently available in Seattle, Portland, San Francisco, LA, San Diego, Denver, Chicago, Cleveland, Boston, DFW, Boston, NYC, and more.

If you want to use WhatTapped without an account, ignore the "Account linking required" prompt and click the X in the top right when it prompts you to login or create an account.

Anybody can use WhatTapped to ask questions such as where is a particular beer in a city or what beers are new at a particular bar. If you link Alexa to you WhatTapped account (free sign up at https://www.whattapped.com) you can also ask questions such as where are My Beers in a particular city or what bar has the most of My Beers in a particular city.

This skill is developed for people who are of legal drinking age in their respective country (21+ in the USA, 18+ or 19+ in Canada). Drink responsibly and don't drive if you are even remotely intoxicated.
